ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This project was financially supported by the Dutch Ministry of Economic Affairs, Agriculture and Innovation (project 1217261301). We thank Frédérique van Holthoon for her contribution to the method development and FERA for kindly supplying amantadine-affected muscle samples.
